typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(, )
ConditionalSplit1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
